title: Taxes and spending negotiations get underway; Plus census reveals voter turnout broke records
description: Chuck talks about his exclusive interviews with Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen and senators Rob Portman (R-Ohio) and Bernie Sanders (I-Vt.). Carrie Dann looks at the new numbers inside the 2020 census.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
